Title: The Delivery Pipeline with Steven Murawski
Description: What's the Delivery Pipeline and why should you care? Richard chats with Steven Murawaski about his work at Chef, helping organizations get more effective at delivering software. Steven talks about how the latest generation of platform tools such as containers, that while helping to automate the delivery of software, are not a panacea that eliminates all the challenges of said software. You still have to take the time to get your automation right and deeply understand the value of being able to rapid-fire deploy. When you go faster, things get better!
